connection.title: Log in or Sign up to Jump In
connection.title_new_user: Create an Account to Jump In
connection.metamask_not_installed: You need to install the MetaMask Browser Extension to proceed. Please install it and try again.

email_login_modal.title: Enter verification code
email_login_modal.subtitle_suffix: . Please enter the code below to complete verification.
email_login_modal.enter_complete_code: Please enter the complete verification code
email_login_modal.invalid_or_expired: The code is invalid or expired. Please resend code
email_login_modal.network_error: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.

errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network_error: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.failed_send_code: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
errors.different_account_session: Detected a different account session than the verified email. Please try logging in again.
errors.no_connected_account: Thirdweb connection did not return a connected account

connection_layout.error: You did not confirm this action in your digital wallet extension. To continue, please try again.
connection_layout.error_locked_wallet: Your wallet is currently locked. To continue, please unlock your wallet and try again.
connection_layout.waiting_for_signature: Confirm in your digital wallet extension to continue.
connection_layout.waiting_for_signature_magic: Almost done! Confirm your request to login Decentraland
connection_layout.validating_sign_in: Just a moment, we're verifying your login credentials...

request.verification_match: Does the verification number below match the one in the {explorerText}?
request.deep_link_confirm: Please confirm you want to sign in to {explorerText}
request.timeout_logged_out: You might be logged out of your wallet extension.
request.timeout_check_login: Please check that you're logged in and try again.

wallet_interaction.title_web2: A scene wants to access your Decentraland account assets
wallet_interaction.title_web3: The {explorerText} wants to interact with your wallet
wallet_interaction.description: Only proceed if you are aware of all transaction details and trust this scene.

timeout.title: Looks like you took too long and the request has expired.
timeout.subtitle: If the expiration time is still running in the Explorer app, check your computer's time to see if it's set correctly.
timeout.description: Please return to Decentraland's {explorerText} to try again.

different_account.title: Looks like you are connected with a different account.
different_account.description: Please change your wallet account to the one connected to the {explorerText}.

sign_in_complete.title: Login Successful!
sign_in_complete.description: Return to the {explorerText} to jump in!

denied_sign_in.title: Did the number not match, or was this action not taken by you?
denied_sign_in.description: If you're trying to sign in, retry the action. If this action was not initiated by you, dismiss this message.

wallet_interaction_complete.title: Wallet interaction complete
wallet_interaction_complete.description: The action has been executed successfully.

denied_wallet_interaction.title: Was this action not initiated by you?
denied_wallet_interaction.description: If this action was not initiated by you, dismiss this message.

signing_error.title: There was an error while trying to submit the request.
signing_error.description: Return to the {explorerText} to try again, or contact support if the error persists.

recover_error.title: There was an error recovering the request...
recover_error.description: The request is not available anymore. Feel free to create a new one and try again. If the expiration time is still running in the Explorer app, check your computer's time to see if it's set correctly.

ip_validation_error.title: Security Validation Failed
ip_validation_error.description: This confirmation request was created from a different device or network. For security reasons, you can only complete this request from the same device where it was originally initiated.

continue_in_app.redirect_countdown: You will be redirected to {explorerText} in {countdown}...
continue_in_app.app_not_launched: The application could not be launched. Please make sure {explorerText} is installed and try again.

confirm.gifting_warning: Gifting an item cannot be undone.

alert.default_text: You can close this tab and return to the Decentraland app.

setup.meet_avatar_description_desktop:
Say hi to your new digital self!
Don't worry, of course they're not quite 'you' yetâ€”soon you'll be able to customize them to your heart's content.
setup.meet_avatar_description_mobile: Choose an avatar to start your journey.
setup.meet_avatar_description_mobile_bold: You can customize it later on desktop

validation.username_max_length: Sorry, usernames can have a maximum of 15 characters.
validation.username_no_special_chars: Sorry, special characters (!@#$%) are not permitted.
validation.agree_required: Please accept the terms of use and privacy policy.

setup.email_newsletter: Subscribe to Decentraland's newsletter to receive the latest news about events, updates, contests and more.
setup.deploy_error_title: An error occurred while creating your account
setup.deploy_error_description: Please, contact support with the following error message:

avatar_setup.only_letters_numbers: Only letters and numbers are supported
avatar_setup.email_newsletter: Subscribe to newsletter for updates on features, events, contests, and more.
avatar_setup.deploy_error: An error occurred while creating your profile: {error}

validation.agree_required: Please accept the terms of use and privacy policy.

clock_sync_modal.title: Device Clock Out of Sync
clock_sync_modal.message: Please update your computer's time settings to the correct local time to avoid server timeout issues.

invalid_redirection.title: Invalid redirection
invalid_redirection.description: The site you were redirected to is invalid.
invalid_redirection.go_back: Go back to the login page

mobile_auth.redirect_countdown:
You will be redirected to
{explorerText} in {countdown}...
mobile_auth.app_not_launched: The application could not be launched. Please make sure {explorerText} is installed and try again.
